contributionDescription:
I MINTed many NFTs at Base's on-chain summer and told them how great NEF is.
It also holds NFTs for many OPs. I will continue to share the beauty of OP's NFTs with many people.I have also done mods on many NFT projects. I would be happy to assist you with anything you need. I can speak Japanese and English.
